RTCIceCandidatePairStatsResponsesSent.summary: The responsesSent property of the dictionary indicates the total number of {{Glossary("STUN")}} connectivity check responses that have been sent so far on the connection described by this pair of candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsResponsesSent.value: An integer value indicating the number of times a response has been sent to a STUN connectivity check request.Since it isn't possible to tell the difference between connectivity check requests and consent requests, this value includes both.
